Hi Gordon-

Looks like that's exactly what's happening.  The crawl log is o=
nly 
still reporting 3 sites out of 20.  One of them, washingtonpost.com, 
=
looks like it may be rejecting our connections quite frequently 
because it=
 doesn't like how aggressively I'm crawling.  Could be the 
same with the o=
thers.  

> 
> If your rules are set to 
> reject everything after 2 hops, =
then on a page that's exactly two 
hops 
> from the start, every discovered=
 outlink on that page will be 
> considered, but then rejected for being to=
o many hops (3) away. As a 
> result, no outlink that's 4 hops away will ev=
er even be 
> discovered/considered.
> 
> Hope this helps,

Helps a lot tha=
nks.  I was worried it was still going to that 4th hop 
even though they'd =
all be rejected.  Glad it looks like it's just an 
issue with these few sit=
es.

Thanks very much.

-Adam
